data.eml:eml: Three new genera of Schizopteridae from Australia with description of six new species (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Schizopteridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hill, Lionel (2015): Three new genera of Schizopteridae from Australia with description of six new species (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Schizopteridae). Zootaxa 3990 (1): 73-96, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3990.1.4
